2 7 50
   This is an entry to the next menu level which 
allows to the user to set parameters of Monte 
Carlo program VEGAS and launch it.
   After a VEGAS run the information about
cross-section is displayed on the screen and 
is written in the file. 
 The user also has a posibility  to fill various
distributions during the integral evaluation.
 During Vegas sessions user can prepare Monte
Carlo event generatoe and start it.
